text: لَا يَغُرَّنَّكَ تَقَلُّبُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ

translation.en.sahih: Be not deceived by the [uninhibited] movement of the disbelievers throughout the land.
translation.id.indonesian: Janganlah sekali-kali kamu terperdaya oleh kebebasan orang-orang kafir bergerak di dalam negeri.
